original_title: Juan Formell y Los Van Van - Aqui El Que Baila Gana el Concierto
overview: Finally, a superb quality DVD concert performance befitting the legacy of Juan Formell y Los Van Van. And what a legacy! Formell and his crew have been churning out major hits with infectious hooks for four decades
title: Juan Formell y Los Van Van - Aqui El Que Baila Gana el Concierto
